67512
Test: public void testWithTimeZoneOverride() throws Exception { ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(); mapper.setDateFormat(new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd/HH:mm z")); mapper.setTimeZone(TimeZone.getTimeZone("PST")); mapper.disable(SerializationFeature.WRITE_DATES_AS_TIMESTAMPS); serialize( mapper, judate(1969, 12, 31, 16, 00, 00, 00, "PST"), "1969-12-31/16:00 PST"); mapper.setLocale(Locale.FRANCE); serialize( mapper, judate(1969, 12, 31, 16, 00, 00, 00, "PST"), "1969-12-31/16:00 PST"); ObjectWriter w = mapper.writer(); w = w.with(TimeZone.getTimeZone("EST")); String json = w.writeValueAsString(new Date(0)); }
Code: public final void serialize(JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider ctxt){if (_value == null) {;} else if (_value instanceof JsonSerializable) {((JsonSerializable) _value).serialize(gen, ctxt);} else {;}}
